【考法 1】n. 粗暴：roughness of manner or of temper
【例】She responded with such asperity that we knew she was offended by the question.
【近】roughness, crudity, rudeness, poignancy['pɔɪɡnənsi], harshness
【反】softness, mildness 脾气好
【考法 2】 n.苛刻，严重：rigor, severity
【例】He has encountered more asperities on the road to success.
【近】severity, hardness, hardship, rigor
【记】 a不 + prosperity繁荣→不繁荣，不顺利→艰苦；desperate 绝望，亡命的→亡命徒们的特点是粗糙，粗暴，严酷
【另】 exasperate（激怒），rasper（激怒人的行为）, severity 严肃, 严重
A true friend is one soul in two bodies. 真正的朋友是异体同心。
